Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified IP multicast group and the local interface address.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `ifindex` parameter specifies the interface on which data is received or sent.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the interface index that is associated with a multicast group.
Docs.value: A value that specifies the address of the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property specifies the interface on which data is received or sent.
